body.name: Soularge Women's Winter Plus Size Thickened Cotton Coat with Detachable Hood
features: Fabric type Shell: 100% Cotton; Filling: 100% Polyester; Lining: 100% Polyester

Soft and Warm: Using high-class micro fiber for shell and develop high technology of peached treatment, feeling warm and soft. Comfortable fleece lining and filled with compressible cotton, store the body heat effeciently in the cold.

Utility pockets: the plus size women jacket designed with two fleece lined handwarmer pockets on the side, which covered one layer button closure security pockets. Another inside pockets provide convenience for keep important items.
Suitable fitting : Personalized clipping the ergonomic draping, more suitable for bigger size women wear. Stretchable shoulder and adjustable waist string keep you more comfortable.
Wearing occasion: Classic plus size women jacket suitable for daily wear and office work. Extremely Warm and comfortable wearing it outdoor, hiking, traveling, camping and various outdoor activities.

Attention: For the convenience of transport, the package we use damp proof 3D oxford package. If the clothes is not very flat when you take it out, please don't worry, this jakcet is made by pure cotton fabric, just washed once again and hang out some times, it will recovered soon. 30℃ machine wash(recommend hand wash), Hang Dry, Dry Cleanning,Do not Bleach,Wash seperately.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: True pure cotton Good warmth retention: The high-density weave of pure cotton fabric can effectively protect the body from cold air. Good breathability: Pure cotton fabric is breathable, providing a comfortable wearing experience and preventing discomfort caused by sweat buildup. High comfort: Pure cotton fabric is soft and comfortable, with a good hand feel and a comfortable wearing experience. Good abrasion resistance: Pure cotton fabric is abrasion-resistant and not prone to pilling, which contributes to its durability. Health and environmental: Pure cotton fabric is made of natural fibers, does not contain harmful chemicals, is safe for human health, and friendly to the environment. Easy to care: Pure cotton fabric is easy to clean, does not deform easily, and is comfortable to wear, making it easy to maintain on a daily basis.

Double closure placket High quality SBS zipper with windproof button down placket Functional chest pocket Two utility zip up chest pockets provide more storage for daily life 3D side pockets Fleece lined hand warmer pockets and button down patch pockets give you a fashion look and greater function

Soularge Women's Winter Plus Size Thickened Cotton Coat with Detachable Hood This plus size women's winter jacket from Soularge is designed to keep you stylish and cozy in the coldest weather. The soft and breathable material ensures maximum comfort while the chic design flatters your figure all season long. Available in a range of sizes, you can find your perfect fit and make a statement this winter. 1. Various size This winter jacket is specially designed for plus-size women, with a wide range of sizes from 1X to 6X. We understand that every woman deserves to feel comfortable in their own skin, and we're here to make sure that our clothing is there to support them, no matter their size. With our extensive size options, we're confident that we can help women of all shapes and sizes find the perfect fit. 2. Cold defender Stay warm and stylish this winter with our collection of coats. Our windproof hoods and ribbed cuffs keep out the chill, while our plush fleece-lined pockets will keep you cozy. Our coats are filled with premium insulation for maximum warmth and comfort. Find your perfect fit in our women's plus size coats and stay cozy this season. 3.Size chose: Check the size chart carefully, as sizing may vary across brands. Choose the size that best fits your measurements, taking into account height and weight. Read customer reviews to see how other customers found the sizing. This can be especially helpful if someone has a similar body type to you. 4.Wash care: Machine washable, hand washable, low-temperature drying, do not bleach, wash dark and light-colored garments separately. 5.Other: Cotton fabric jackets may develop wrinkles during the transportation process, but don't worry. They will bounce back to a fluffy and smooth state after washing and drying, or by hanging them in a well-ventilated area for a few days

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Warm Beautiful Coat
reviews.reviewText: This coat is very warm, heavy and beautiful! It is the nicest winter coat that I have ever had! It is true to size, made very durable and strong and I love the zipper and snaps on it! This is a coat for very cold weather. Hopefully here in Tennessee I won't need it very often! But I am prepared just in case!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this coat. It’s well made, fits great (I got one size larger than my normal clothing size to allow for bulky winter clothing), comfortable, and looks great. It keeps the wind from cutting through and kept my FL butt warm during my visit to NY. Definitely would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Better than I expected for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly really great quality. It's heavy weight and keeps me super warm against the cold and wind. Not very flattering around my body because it runs pretty large, but otherwise I love it for it's purpose. I also love all the pockets. I'm a dog mom so it's great for storing treats, poop bags, my phone, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality product. Stylish. Functional. Comfy.
reviews.reviewText: Love everything about this coat. It's well made. It's beautiful. It's true to size. It's warm and comfy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Fit & Comfortably Inside & Outside
reviews.reviewText: Using for My Everyday Use. Excellent Fit, Comfortable, Warm, Love the Inside of Soft Fur , The Color is Perfect!!The Pockets are great for for Gloves, iPhone , Sunglasses, etc …..Shopping for this was really easy, I got to use the TRY-It before you buy✨✨✨✨✨🫶🏼💟So Happy !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Warm but weighs too much to be comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This coat fits well, looks good and is very warm however for me, taking it on and off is a workout. I don't know what they lined it with but it is very heavy and as I have arthritis it is sometimes too much to manage. Surely there are other lining fabrics they could have used that provide similar warmth without all the weight. I'll have to save this one for only the coldest of days. I wish it weighed less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for large chests
reviews.reviewText: Finally, I found something in plus size that can actually fit over large breasts. I wear a I or J cup and size 22 pants. This jacket is warm, soft, well made, and actually closes without a struggle over my chest. I am 5'4" 270lbs, 57, 45, 56

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered size 4XL, the volume fits, but the sleeves are a little long, I think 3XL would be the best size. I feel comfortable in the jacket, warm and pleasant. I recommend to buy

I love this jacket. I like the elastic cuffs for keeping the cold out in our Canadian winters. plus having shorter arms but being plus sized. The lining in the jacket and hood is so soft and cozy. There are plenty of pockets, including an inside one. They secure for extra protection to not lose keys or phone. There is extra wind break over the zipper with button closure. I am completely satisfied and would highly recommend this jacket. I'm short 5'4" and the length is perfect, the pockets aren't so far down I have to bend over to reach into them.The hood has drawstring to keep weather out and the waist can be drawn in as well. I love it 😀
So glad I bought these. One for my sister and one for my mom. They are very happy and warm and cozy now with these coats. The fit is very good and they both recommend them.

reviews.reviewTitle: Fits well. Not as warm as I would like
reviews.reviewText: This coat is just what they say it is in looks and the quality. My only wish is that they would have put the fur like material down the arms as well as the body. But over all I love this jacket.
It's nice to look at its not sack looking or boxxy fits great and its warm for winter inexpensive best looking winter jacket in years
It’s currently -50c with the wind chill and this jacket is super warm!
